Lost

(a Titles &
Air Dates Guide)

by this TV.com editor
aired from: Sep 2004
to: ___ ____		 97+ eps ABC 60 min
  • Matthew Fox as Jack Shepard
  • Evangeline Lilly as Kate Austen
  • Dominic Monaghan as Charlie
  • Josh Holloway as James "Sawyer" Ford
  • Naveen Andrews as Sayid
  • Terry O'Quinn as John Locke
  • Daniel Dae Kim as Jin
  • Harold Perrineau Jr. as Michael
  • Yunjin Kim as Sun
  • Maggie Grace as Shannon
  • Jorge Garcia as Hurley
  • Malcolm David Kelley as Walt
  • Ian Somerhalder as Boone Carlyle [ 1 ]
  • Emilie de Ravin as Claire
